mapper.insert: insert into sale (category, pname, price, image) values (#{category}, #{pname}, #{price}, #{image})
mapper.update: update sale set pname=#{pname}, price=#{price}, image=#{image} where pnumber=#{pnumber}
mapper.select:
select * from sale
pname like concat('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
price like concat('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
select pnumber, category, pname, price, image from sale where category=1
select pnumber, category, pname, price, image from sale where category=2
select pnumber, category, pname, price, image from sale where category=3
select pnumber, pname, price, image, case when category=1 then '상의' when category =2 then '하의' else '잡화' end as 'category' from sale
